title: Assessment of wafer scale MoS2 atomic layers grown by metal–organic chemical vapor deposition using organo-metal, organo-sulfide, and H2S precursors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22618-22626
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04279D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Michael Curtis, Olivia Maryon, Nicholas McKibben, Josh Eixenberger, Chen Chen, Karthik Chinnathambi, Sergej Pasko, Salim El Kazzi, Joan M. Redwing, David Estrada
Wafer scale transition metal dichalcogenide films grown by MOCVD using two different chalcogen precursors are assessed for layer homogeneity and quality. These characteristics are then compared to electrical properties on the growth substrate.
